>
>Or the first "DELETE" could be a PUT.
>

Hmmm, I don't think it would be right for a PUT to change the status of 
a resource from 200 to 410.  Besides, on my system, it is not possible 
to PUT a zero-byte file because the server only accepts well-formed XML 
in PUT requests.

-Eric
